Reviews.Content: residence barberini offers comfortable apartments close proximity spanish steps husband traveled rome 2 son found apartments suited perfectly spacious comfortable allowing plenty 3 lucky stay beautiful penthouse suite complete views pantheon st peters basilica terraces wonderful enjoy bottle wine day seeing sights rome loved close proximity spanish steps villa borghese drive rome parking garage literally corner apartment found convenient perk staying hotel dont require minimum night stay provide daily cleaning service definitely stay residence barberini
